## Logger.error() method

Logs an event with the LogEventLevel.error severity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
error(error: Error, messageTemplate: string, ...properties: any[]): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | Error | Error for the log event. |
|  messageTemplate | string | Message template for the log event. |
|  properties | any\[\] | Properties that can be used to render the message template. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
